nodes.bodyText:
These should be to methods on the PluginListItem/PHP.PluginItem and those classes made private again.
It would probably better for this to become an interface and make those classes implement it
Went for the interface in the end. One wart is that getName already exists on one of the implementers so I had to call the method getSearchableName, but it's still better than the original proposal
the comparator should be cached in a final field. Most of these methods are single use and should be inlined (+ a comment if its not otherwise obvious what they do)
maybe use a guava Splitter so you can filter empties
this can probably just be a static method on the comparator

+package net.runelite.client.plugins.config;
+
+import java.util.ArrayList;
+import java.util.List;
+import net.runelite.client.util.Text;
+import static java.util.stream.Collectors.toList;
+
+public class PluginSearch<T>
+{
+
+	private final List<SearchablePlugin<T>> searchablePlugins;
+
+	public PluginSearch(List<SearchablePlugin<T>> searchablePlugins)
+	{
+		this.searchablePlugins = new ArrayList<>(searchablePlugins);
+	}
+
+	public List<T> query(String query)

nodes.bodyText: Decided to merge the old PluginSearch and PluginSearchComparator, making this a static method and making the comparator constructor private
